TypeSignature.Value: public delegate IntPtr GRVkGetProcedureAddressDelegate(string name, IntPtr instance, IntPtr device);
.class public auto ansi sealed GRVkGetProcedureAddressDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The name of the Vulkan function to look up.
The Vulkan instance handle, or for global functions.
The Vulkan device handle, or for instance-level functions.
Docs.summary: A delegate for resolving Vulkan function addresses by name.
Docs.returns: The function pointer for the requested Vulkan function, or if not found.
